name: Mindmancer
description:
GMTK 2021 ENTRY

You are able to take control over other people, but they do exact same moves you do! You also share one life with them, so - whenever somebody you control dies - you die!

CONTROLS

WASD - move

R - restart

B - disconnect from connected minds

ESC - exit

Art by:

https://twitter.com/BaronVonFoo

Programming & level design by:

https://twitter.com/GameDevMumin

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdk3O_YfSOgBibLnD8Y8Q2w
